Cmp3\Core

Class Config

Cmp3\Config\ConfigAbstract
Cmp3\Config\ConfigResource
Cmp3\Core\Config

All Implemented Interfaces:

ConfigInterface
public class Config
extends ConfigResource

Gives access to the applications configuration values.
This class doesn't handle configuration itself but several other config resources can be registered and provide the real configuration.
The first config resource that has a definition for a property return the value.

GetPropertiesMerged

public array GetPropertiesMerged(string $strConfigPath, string $order=null)

Get configuration properties merged from all resources
Be aware that you may mess up your TS config with this function.
Because the '>' operator in TypoScript doesn't work during run time one couldn't redefine procFields.title inside a mode if we would use this method.

Parameters

$strConfigPath -
$order -
